messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Could you please provide me with your latitude and longitude coordinates? This will help me to identify your location.
No problem! If you can provide me with a city or a place name, I can help you find some information about your location.

I understand. Without specific information like coordinates or a location name, I won't be able to determine where you are. However, if you have access to any maps or location services on your device, you may be able to find your location there. If there's anything else I can assist you with, feel free to let me know!
You could try using your phone's GPS or maps app to see your current location.

I donâ€™t have access to external devices or services like GPS or maps. If you're using a smartphone or a computer, you can usually find your current location through the built-in maps app or GPS functionality. If you need help with anything else, just let me know!
